message.text: Using big data to gain insights about your customers is becoming more common these days.

machine learning is evolving and changing how we use technology in the customer experience.
Machine learning is not new. We have witnessed it since the 1990s, when Amazon introduced a new “recommended for you” section.
Machine learning is at the core of many applications that have become part of daily life, from voice recognition to image perception.
Machine learning is starting to infiltrate all areas of marketing technology, and that's probably a good thing.
Cloud computing est la prochaine étape dans l'évolution d'Internet.
Le Cloud computing est devenu le nouveau mot à la mode tirée en grande partie par le marketing et les offres de services de grands groupes comme Google, IBM et Amazon.
Cloud computing fournit le moyen par lequel tout - de la puissance de calcul de l'infrastructure informatique, des applications, des processus d'affaires pour une autoentreprise
CLOUD peut être livré comme un service où et quand vous en avez besoin.
Il existe principalement trois formes de Cloud computing public , privé et hybride.
Deep Learning is a new area of Machine Learning research, which has been introduced with the objective of moving Machine Learning closer to one of its original goals.
